parameters: \n<???>Oh,\. a customer?\.\. A...\.\.\. catfolk,\. is it?\.\. How rare...\.\.\.
\n<???>I'm Kaere,\. this is my shop.\.\. Do take a look at my counter if you're looking for reagents and healing herbs...
\n<Kaere>Hey...\.\.\. Clients are supposed to stay to the other side of the counter,\. you know?
"...grind the Melmos until they become a fine paste..."
"...injecting \ii[5] nectar seems to speed up their recovery by the 20%..."
"...experiments run on bats and spiders gave inconclusive results in the latest tests..."
"...I'll proceed prioritizing monsters that don't exist anywhere but on this island and other mutated beings..."
"...my contact couldn't provide me any kind of specimen coming from one of the Brass Oxen,\. but I won't desist...\.\.\."
\n<Kaere>Remember,\. cat.\.\. I'll be waiting for you at night in End City,\. right outside "Anemone's Bloom".
\n<Kaere>Stock up on \ii[1]s,\. while you're here losing our time.
\n<Kaere>We should keep moving,\. it could become a dangerous situation...\.\.\. for both of us.
\n<Kaere>There's nothing for you in here,\. ill-fated one.
\n<Kaere>But if you've got \G to spare...\.\.\. ingredients for my magic don't come for cheap.
\n<Kaere>May your path keep you clear of the Hole,\. towering over all of us.
